attributes.action: Make it a criminal offence to Block a Driveway by Parking Across it.
attributes.additional_details: I see many others who have the same problems and go as far as putting Bollards outside their drives which is not legal but have no other option, I’m Disabled and have an H bar on the road from the county council this does not work for a few, as I’m Disabled I could park in many places but choose not to, there has be be a form of a deterrent like a fine at least to make drivers think and hit them in their Pockets.
attributes.background: Due to the amount of Problems it causes not only Abled Bodied but Disabled alike Stopped from being able to use their Vehicles but if Blocked when they return can not get back in, there MUST be a Law created so the Police can deal with them, it’s bad manners and rude to do this.
